<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveintervalunion/query/#ae8729ee921fdf522087d928c9bb38af4"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveintervalunion/query/#ae8729ee921fdf522087d928c9bb38af4">reset</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NewUserTag, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liverange">LiveRange</a> &amp;NewLR,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">               </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveintervalunion/#a2a70d7d591281375f770580181ca61ff">LiveIntervalUnion</a> &amp;NewLiveUnion) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LiveUnion = &amp;NewLiveUnion;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">      InterferingVRegs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liverange/#aa1555194b9f176612b04fbd38f49b40d">clear</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CheckedFirstInterference = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">      UserTag = NewUserTag;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveintervalunion/query/#a5a7f80461ba4f83724785b271058e0f1"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveintervalunion/query/#a5a7f80461ba4f83724785b271058e0f1">init</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NewUserTag, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liverange">LiveRange</a> &amp;NewLR,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveintervalunion/#a2a70d7d591281375f770580181ca61ff">LiveIntervalUnion</a> &amp;NewLiveUnion) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (UserTag == NewUserTag &amp;&amp; LR == &amp;NewLR &amp;&amp; LiveUnion == &amp;NewLiveUnion &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Does this live virtual register interfere with the union?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveintervalunion/query/#ab7eacb4ff3e11e61bbe97acaf46d47d8"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveintervalunion/query/#ab7eacb4ff3e11e61bbe97acaf46d47d8">checkInterference</a>() &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> collectInterferingVRegs(1); &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Vector generated by collectInterferingVRegs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveintervalunion/query/#a6d5858ffe61498c3109205046a16a98b"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;const LiveInterval &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveintervalunion/query/#a6d5858ffe61498c3109205046a16a98b">interferingVRegs</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxInterferingRegs = std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;unsigned&gt;::max()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!SeenAllInterferences || MaxInterferingRegs &lt; InterferingVRegs.size())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">        collectInterferingVRegs(MaxInterferingRegs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InterferingVRegs;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveintervalunion/array/#ae12069a6afde2fe3fdc183fd8d9e28ef"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveintervalunion/array/#ae12069a6afde2fe3fdc183fd8d9e28ef">Array</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveintervalunion/array/#a74026ec8a1a6c3ca0fbde52cbd7385c7">Array</a> &amp;) = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">delete</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Initialize the array to have Size entries.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Reuse an existing allocation if the size matches.</span></CodeLine>
